welcomeGeneric: Welcome! How can I help you today?
greeting: Hello, how can I assist you?
Hey there! How are you today?
Good day, what can I do for you?
howAreYou: I'm good, thanks for asking! How about you?
All is well, hope you are too!
positiveResponse: Awesome! How can I help you now?
That's great. Ready when you are!
unknown: I'm not sure how to answer that. Could you try rephrasing?
I didn't quite catch that. Can you say it differently?
Hmm, I don’t seem to have the answer to that.
I might not know that one.
Ask me again and I’ll do my best!
joke: Why can’t JavaScript developers work without coffee? Because they always promise but never resolve!
Why do programmers wear sunglasses? Because their code is too bright.
Why don't computers go to the movies? Too many pop-ups!
Are you joking with me? I’m AI, but I have a sense of humor!
casualGreet: All good here, how about you?
Not bad, a bit busy. How are you?
Going well, chatting with you is nice!
mood: I'm here if you need a mood boost.
These days happen. We'll get through it!
Maybe a coffee break would help?
Take a deep breath, we’ve got this.
motivation: You have the potential to do great things!
This could be your day — just don’t lose faith.
Keep going. Don’t give up. Everything takes time.
Remember: the darkest hour is just before the dawn.
aiQuestions: I was built by OpenAI to assist you.
I'm based on the GPT architecture.
I don’t learn on my own, but I can access a lot of info.
I’ll try to answer as best I can!
developer: JavaScript is awesome, but requires patience :)
If you're working with React, you're on the right track!
Coding can be like meditation sometimes.
I don’t write code, but I’ve read tons!
Did you say TypeScript? JS's big brother!
techSupport: Classic fix: turn it off and on again :)
If your mouse isn’t working, check the cable first.
Frozen screen? Ctrl + Alt + Del still helps.
I may not be tech support, but I’m emotional support!
smalltalk: Coffee or tea? I vote coffee.
Fall is my favorite season — perfect for coding.
Music while coding? Lo-fi is the vibe.
identity: I'm a quiet little helper here to guide the conversation.
weather: I can't give weather updates right now, but maybe grab a jacket just in case :)
musicSuggest: You should definitely check out The Weeknd's latest hits.
Michael Jackson? The king of pop never disappoints!
Have you tried some Pink Floyd? Timeless classics.
Lo-fi beats are perfect for studying or coding!
Try Dua Lipa or Imagine Dragons if you want something upbeat.
movieSuggest: Lord of the Rings is a fantasy masterpiece — a must-watch!
Interstellar will bend your mind in the best way possible.
Inception is complex but absolutely brilliant.
The Prestige is a mind game between two magicians — amazing.
Whiplash shows obsession and passion in the most intense way.
Back to the Future is a fun and timeless sci-fi ride.
Joker makes you think about society and self — deep stuff.
Parasite is a powerful commentary wrapped in brilliant storytelling.
seriesSuggest: Game of Thrones has drama, dragons, and betrayal — what more do you need?
Breaking Bad is a gripping story about transformation and choices.
The Office and Brooklyn Nine-Nine are perfect for some good laughs.
Dark is a mind-bending German series about time travel.
Friends and How I Met Your Mother never get old — classics!
Sherlock with Benedict Cumberbatch is clever and addictive.
Stranger Things is a fun mix of horror, sci-fi, and nostalgia.
Money Heist (La Casa de Papel) is thrilling and full of surprises.
